page.title: 03LEISURE TIME IN LLANGOLLEN.
page.content: We are very lucky in Llangollen there is plenty to see and do.There are a lot of{clubs and organisations.}We have two{Brownie}packs,one{Guide company,one{Cub}pack and one{Scout pack.They all meet in the Guide Head quarters in between the Liberal Club and Welfare House.The Brownies meet on Wednesdays,the Guides on Thursdays,the Cubs on Mondays and the Scouts on Fridays.The third Llangollen Brownies meet on Wednesdays in the Memorial Hall.Willow Hill{Youth Club}meets 3 times a week at 7p.m.In Oak Street there is an antique shop with a{Doll {Museum}inside.In the summer there is the{International Musical Eisteddfod where people from all over the world come.Running through Llangollen is the {Shropshire Union Canal.}On a pleasant day a ride on a horse drawn boat or a walk along the tow path is ideal.
